problems.question: λ¦¬μ¤νΈμ—μ„ μ„Έ μμ ν•©μ΄ 0μΈ μ΅°ν•© κ°μ
μ„Έ μλ¦¬ μ μ¤‘ κ° μλ¦Ώμ ν•©μ΄ 10μΈ μμ κ°μ

answer.code:
count = 0
for n in range(100, 1000):
    hundreds = n // 100
    tens = (n // 10) % 10
    ones = n % 10
    if hundreds + tens + ones == 10:
        count += 1
print(count)
